hero.title: Master your chess opening repertoire with spaced repetition!
hero.subtitle: LinePrep helps you learn and memorize chess openings through interactive practice sessions. Build your repertoire, track your progress, and never forget your lines again.

spacedRepetition.title: Spaced Repetition
spacedRepetition.description: Practice positions you struggle with more often. Our smart algorithm helps you retain openings in long-term memory.

database.title: Comprehensive Database
database.description: Access a complete database of chess openings or create your own custom lines to practice your personal repertoire.

stacks.title: Learning Stacks
stacks.description: Organize openings into themed collections. Group by playing style, opponent strength, or tournament preparation.

progress.title: Track Your Progress
progress.description: Detailed statistics show your accuracy, practice streaks, and areas that need more work. Watch yourself improve over time.

interactive.title: Interactive Practice
interactive.description: Practice with a real chessboard interface. Get instant feedback on your moves and learn from your mistakes.

custom.title: Custom Openings
custom.description: Build and practice your own opening variations. Perfect for preparing against specific opponents or trying new ideas.

step1.title: Choose Your Openings
step1.description: Browse our opening database or create custom lines. Select the openings you want to learn and add them to your practice queue.

step2.title: Practice Interactively
step2.description: Play through positions on an interactive chessboard. LinePrep presents you with positions and tests your knowledge of the correct moves.

step3.title: Track & Improve
step3.description: Monitor your accuracy and progress over time. Review statistics to identify weak spots and focus your practice where it matters most.

overview.title: 1. Data Protection at a Glance
overview.paragraph1: The following notices provide a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data by which you can be personally identified.
overview.paragraph2: For detailed information on data protection, please refer to our privacy policy listed below this text.

controller.title: 2. Data Controller
controller.name: Name
controller.note: The controller is the natural or legal person who alone or jointly with others determines the purposes and means of the processing of personal data.

personal.title: What personal data do we collect?
personal.intro: We collect the following personal data when you register and use our service:

items.email: Email address (for account creation and authentication)
items.practice: Practice data and progress statistics (to provide the spaced repetition functionality)

technical.title: What technical data do we collect?
technical.intro: When you visit our website, our web server automatically collects:

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis for Data Processing
legalBasis.intro: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:

consent.title: Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR (Consent)
consent.content: When you create an account, you consent to the processing of your data

contract.title: Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (Contract)
contract.content: Processing is necessary to provide our chess practice service

legitimate.title: Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (Legitimate Interests)
legitimate.content: We have a legitimate interest in improving our service and preventing abuse

supabase.title: Supabase (Database & Authentication)
supabase.content: We use Supabase for user authentication and data storage. Your data is stored on servers in the EU. Supabase is GDPR compliant.

google.title: Google OAuth (Optional Authentication)
google.content: If you choose to sign in with Google, we receive your email address and basic profile information from Google. This is processed according to Google's privacy policy.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Session Data
cookies.paragraph1: Our website uses cookies to maintain your login session. These are essential cookies required for the website to function properly.
cookies.paragraph2: You can configure your browser to inform you about the use of cookies so that you can decide on a case-by-case basis whether to accept or reject a cookie. Alternatively, your browser can be configured to automatically accept cookies under certain conditions or to always reject them.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: Right of access
access.content: You have the right to obtain confirmation as to whether personal data concerning you is being processed and to access this data

rectification.title: Right to rectification
rectification.content: You have the right to have inaccurate personal data corrected

erasure.title: Right to erasure
erasure.content: You have the right to have your personal data deleted

restriction.title: Right to restriction of processing
restriction.content: You have the right to request restriction of processing of your personal data

portability.title: Right to data portability
portability.content: You have the right to receive your personal data in a structured, commonly used format

objection.title: Right to object
objection.content: You have the right to object to processing of your personal data

withdraw.title: Right to withdraw consent
withdraw.content: If processing is based on your consent, you have the right to withdraw consent at any time

rights.complaint: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority if you believe that processing of your personal data violates the GDPR.

retention.title: 8. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. When you delete your account, all associated personal data will be permanently deleted within 30 days.

security.title: 9. Data Security
security.content: We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration. All data transmissions are encrypted using SSL/TLS technology.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy to reflect changes in our practices or for legal, operational, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page.
